dict.acceptation: 魔法；巫术；戏法；不可思议的魔力；
魔术的；幻术的；不可思议的；有奇异魔力的；
用魔法变出；用魔法摆脱；用魔法得到；使中邪；

sent.orig: The Myoblast Autologous Grafting in Ischemic Cardiomyopathy (MAGIC) trial: first randomized placebo-controlled study of myoblast transplantation.
sent.trans: 骨骼肌成肌细胞移植治疗缺血性心肌病(MAGIC)试验：成肌细胞移植的第一个安慰剂-对照试验。

sent.orig: Do you have any relationships with any of the current Orlando Magic players, right now?
sent.trans: 你跟magic现在的那些球员关系密切吗，有来往不？

sent.orig: Have you been able to get in contact with any of the Magic players?
sent.trans: 你和magic的球员们取得了联系吗？

sent.orig: Secret Magic Stone rocks, also as secret, so secret Secret Magic Temple, also as Temple.
sent.trans: 秘密岩又称秘魔岩，因此秘密寺又称秘魔寺。

sent.orig: This is the magic of Prana Flow and the magic of yoga.
sent.trans: 这就是能量流的魔力，瑜伽的魔力。
